message.body: So.., I got the practicum. Now do I take it and change programs at work?
Awesome!!! Would changing programs be awful?

Well I wouldn't have a 'home' I would be a tss in different schools within the philly school district but there isn't really a guarantee that my current position will be there coming the new school year because it seems as if they are fading my program. Like I really can't learn anymore where I'm at.
But it's home haha
Ohhhh well as much as it sucks I guess your best bet is to switch. Especially if it seems like they're trying to fade you out

It's like I'm trying to talk myself into it even though I know I should do it. I figure if I make the move instead of them making it for me I will feel better about it. And it's the freaking university of penn!
Very true! Do it Laura!
Thanks!! Haha that's what I want. Someone to make the decision for me haha
Hahaha I got you
We need to find those sugar daddies
If only.
We sure do lol

It's okay for me to have hung up on manny and not to talk to him for a day probably more because when I was trying to say how am I going to work and do this practicum and he responded with 'just roll with it' and then started talking about how many views a video had???
Uhhh yes. I would have hung up. What the hell is that

Crystal I was seriously livid. Like pretend to have some respect for my life and problems. He was like 'are you really mad!?' Umm yes I'm really effing mad. I like to every little detail of his day and then something important like this gets that response?

Yeah I'd be mad too. How could he just brush it off like that and act like he doesn't care. That's irritating. I feel like you 2 have known each other long enough to a genuine interest in what's going on in your lives, especially something like this
ï¿¼
I have no what audio just sent to you...
But you're right. I was left wondering does he even know what I do for a living. Like how can you just brush me off like I was completely boring you and you had no time for me.
Lol it was just background noise from the TV and I think your dad said something if that makes you feel better
But yeah you have every right to be mad. He's stupid if he thinks your mad for some dumb reason. What he did was hurtful and you shouldn't let him slide.

Haha that's what I figured. He is watching the Phillies game... I was really hurt. Like complete strangers at least pretend to have some interest. And I'll be damned if he thinks I'm calling him. Like he is the one who owes me an apology
Definitely! Well just know I'm happy for you
Aww thank you! I love you.

I need to just let this go. But after I told him I was going to hang up, two days ago. He never even attempted to contact me. Not a text or call. If I know someone is mad at me. I try to make it right. I hate that he decided if I needed space or not
Okay. I thought I was crazy! I haven't been ignoring he hasn't attempted shit!
Oh wow. That's crazy.
Ya think he would at least try. That's annoying.
Like I want him to attempt to invade my space. I probably more mad that he doesn't care that I'm mad. Real girlie shit
Yeah that makes me mad too and I'm not even part of this haha

Haha you are by association. Like he is going to call when he needs something and expects me to want to talk to him and pretend like nothing is wrong. He will never approach the topic and if I bring it up in dramatic
Well forget him.

I was honestly thinking that. All yesterday I kept saying to myself that I'm too pretty and smart for this. Haha. I mean it could look like something simple but this situation says much more than it seems
Like it was a real life changing situation i was trying to make and that's what I got? No support nothing!?!
I agree. He should have had some sort of reaction. Geeze. This is a major thing for you

I mean I'm literally stressing the eff out. It's no joke I have to make sure they give me a schedule that gives me insurance etc. and I would have liked just so acknowledgement that it was stressful and would be okay. Or just the fact that he could have listened
Yeah I agree. So we're either both crazy or both right. I'd go with the latter.
Oh we are both right. He could have ignored me. It's the principle of that fact that his response mid my sentence was 'oh wow look how many views this video got'.. You can't be serious
Yeah that's just irksome.
I'm trying to let this shit just slide for my sanity. Not let it go but slide haha
Haha never forget!
Ha! Never. Even if I tried.
He called me twice while I was at work, call back?
Eh call back just to let him know you're alive. But not to chit chat if that's what he has in mind.
Yeh I'm sure I will be short with him.
Tell your dad I said happy birthday!
Aww! I sure will. Thank you!
What?!
Oh snappp lol
We must do it all!!
Of course!
So much is happening in philly
I love it! Lol
Yes I'm excited
He said he was just being sarcastic but he knew something was wrong because he said he could hear it in my voice.
Pffffft
Right like eff you dude.
I'm pretty sure manny's friend is hitting on me.
Uhhhhh awkward.
Haha so I was on Bluetooth and manny is in the car with his friend. Manny gets out of the car and I know this friend so he started asking me how life is and what I do for fun etc
Hmm that's fine I think lol
Hey he shouldn't have left... I was just bullshiting.
He was on the phone when I was talking to manny when I was telling him I was annoyed with him and he said 'wow he is so insensitive' umm thank you!!!
And makes me feel less crazy
Lol that's great
